Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lee-Anne
Reviews.Content: Personally, I like this phone. I was skeptical about it at first due to the bad reviews, but for me it does the trick. All I use this phone for is texting, internet, and the occasional phone call. For the most part I just text on it. The keyboard is really nice, but it is the first keyboard phone I have ever had so I wouldn't know what a nice one really feels like. The touch screen is amazing in my opinion. I used to own a Samsung Eternity, and I hated it. This phone is much better than that one. Overall, I am very please with the Sharp FX. It is the best phone I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: mrs cook
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my daughter becs her phone broke. I didnt want to use our upgrade on our att plan. She loves he phone does everything she needs it to do. She mostly enjoys the music she can listen to instead of using her mp3 player.

Reviews.Title: Bought as replacement for damaged cell phone
Reviews.Author: B. Brickell "truth finder"
Reviews.Content: This is an exact model replacement for one that my daughter broke the glass screen. I was looking for the same model since she really liked this particular one from Sharp. I also didn't want to pay full price at the cell phone store. I was glad I found this on Amazon for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: understandable
Reviews.Author: steven torres
Reviews.Content: I feel as being an "older" phone it is really advanced. Yeah sure it doesn't have the fancy apps of an iphone or Galaxy but if you are looking for a phone to just text/call or go on social media it is perfect

Reviews.Title: nice phone/right price
Reviews.Author: S. Carlson
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a replacement for my son's that broke.  It is in god condition and shipped fast.  Has everything needed for a good basic phone and fast texting

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Zysha
Reviews.Content: Its a great phone and its also durable! I really love it and its great for texting and calling! But its not good for the internet because its slow.

Reviews.Title: Perfect phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Thurston
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my teenage daughter. She loves it. The phone was perfect and we have not had any troubles with the functioning. For the price it is an excellent phone.

Reviews.Title: Nope
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: Don't even bother with this phone.  I've had it for a little more than a year now and I can't stand it.  Its boring, the touch screen is unsensative, and its always glitching.  The Sharp FX is simply horrible and I wouldn't give to my worst enemy.

Reviews.Title: terrible phone. Sortof.
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Had it for about a year and a half.as for the layout of the phone and the programs on the touchscreen, i love it. the touchscreen works fine. good quality music player. has a headphone jack which is a must have for me.the one thing that throws me off...after about two months the phone started glitching. it would turn off when i opened it. or turn off when i'm in the process of choosing a recipient for a text. and at the moment...im stuck with it, as im under contract...and...well, its decided that i'll be fine with the right half of the screen...twice...that's correct, the right half of the screen is completely duplicated two, three, four, a billion times all over the screen. remember winning a game of Solitaire on your windows computer and seeing the cards fly aroudn and leave a million cards behind? or the XP glitch that would leave a million of the same windows all over the place when you moved a window? essentially the same thing. i cannot see pictures, i cannot read texts, i have to guess where things are because i cannot see the screen.DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE, and with AT&T;, DO NOT WASTE YOUR FREE PHONE ON THIS. it works fine for a few months and then starts to glitch up. this. phone. sucks.

Reviews.Title: Phone has good basic uses
Reviews.Author: schaefer
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for over a year.  I do not do internet or anything too fancy with the phone however, I do text and this keyboard is great for that.  The phone stays lit and the keys do too, which is great at night.  My mom likes this one too because she can actually see the keys.  The screen is easy to read.  I have not had any issues with this phone holding a charge as others have stipulated.  My mom said her phone holds a charge just fine.  I have dropped the phone numerous times and the screen is just fine however, we recently went to see fireworks at the beach and the high humidity caused the screen to stop working temporarily.  It took about a week and then it started working again but response is spotty so I would say do not get wet or use in extreme humidity.  It is easy to use which I like.  It is considered a smart phone without the smart phone fee which I also like.  As for the not being able to hear part; we had a temporary issue then we realized that a key had been pressed so we undid it and it was fine again.  Not sure how it was silenced but it happened.

Reviews.Title: old
Reviews.Author: kyle cooper
Reviews.Content: its not as good or up to date as i thought but it works touch screen is a little off.

Reviews.Title: I didnt get what i expected. Touch screen is THE WORST!!
Reviews.Author: Sachin Balyaya
Reviews.Content: I didnt get what i expected. Touch screen is THE WORST!!I didnt like this phone at all. Wanted to return this but didnt get a chance to do that.  Hence its a waste for me.

Reviews.Title: 1st smart phone disaster
Reviews.Author: Dianne Walker "HR Mgr - Freelance Writer"
Reviews.Content: This is my first phone and I hate it! It freezes, it shuts itself off. The battery charges slowly and goes dead fast.  I leave my house, I'm at work 3 minutes later, without being on the phone. Basically going from charger to charger and the power is at 80%. The SD card is forever not being recognized.  The touchscreen is extremely unresponsive. I had the phone for less then a month and needed to replace it.  Unfortunately I'm under contract - oh the horror of it all!

Reviews.Title: Beatiful phone
Reviews.Author: Cathy Cardona
Reviews.Content: Worked perfectly but unfortunately my daughter dropped it in a bucket of water not even a week after getting it! Needless to say, she was bedside herself not only with anger, but upset that her money was wasted!

Reviews.Title: Sharp Slider phone is very good!
Reviews.Author: T. Berg "Software Locksmith"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good quality item.  Works well and was easy to configure!  Came with everything I needed to start using it right away!

Reviews.Title: sharp fx stx-2 unlocked gsm slider phone with touchscreen
Reviews.Author: Bettie Cleveland
Reviews.Content: it is not a good phone for this day and age. I read other reviews before I ordered it and didnt believe what they said about how it freezes and the internet slow and your camera is old fashion. I had to get me another phone. It did last on the battery longer only because it is not I REPEAT NOT A SMART PHONE!

Reviews.Title: AWFUL!!!
Reviews.Author: Theresa Dawson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my hubby so he could have his first smart phone and so he'd have a slide out keyboard.  I was so excited to give it to him.  When we opened it I almost cried. This thing is so rinky dinky.  The key board was loose and moves around like it will break off. The phone is a joke all the way around.  Sent it back immediately!!

Reviews.Title: Generic
Reviews.Author: Jaslyn Flores
Reviews.Content: Its a cute phone, just did not have the features i needed it to have. Not necessarily a modern smartphone.

Reviews.Title: It's alright
Reviews.Author: Bored reader
Reviews.Content: I like the phone, I have had it for two years and has been a great phone, but now after two years it's screen has started to fade out.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: skittles
Reviews.Content: I was sceptiacal about this phone hearing about the bad reviews. But recived my phone today an i am very pleased with this phone i had previously owned a blackberry an i think i still like this phone more! great touch screen an keyborad is awesome great for txting. very light weight an durable no screen glitching or any bad specs in my opinion. so for someone who xtxs alot this a a great has good abttery life an jus all around works out great!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone but I have to charge it often.
Reviews.Author: Dian T "Dian"
Reviews.Content: Phone is very user friendly and it works great. Only thing I don't like is that it has to be charged about every 6 hours.

Reviews.Title: My phone review
Reviews.Author: Crystal Fields
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving the phone I noticed I'm not able to receive PICTURE MESSAGES so I'm not happy abou that, on the contrary the phone works fine and its a really good phone.

Reviews.Title: Best phone I've ever had.
Reviews.Author: Destiney
Reviews.Content: When I first heard about this phone, I did some research and people were having really big problems with it. However, I've never had any of the problems. My touch screen responds fine to me, it keeps a charge, and is very easy to use. I'm very happy with this phone :)

Reviews.Title: Poor Action
Reviews.Author: Cornelius Okpoebo
Reviews.Content: The performance is poor. It did not give me what I expected. All my addresses did not show with the phone numbers.

Reviews.Title: Descent phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone to replace a phone just like it. Good phone for text and calls. Do not recommend for internet.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Melonie
Reviews.Content: The battery life is HORRIBLE! I had a slide keyboard with my previous phone so when it died they gave me this Sharp FX, I am not happy with the keyboard, the keys are tiny and stand high, just not as good as my Motorola!

Reviews.Title: very deceptive!
Reviews.Author: rikki
Reviews.Content: im not under contract and bought this phone less than a month ago and now im buying a new (different brand) phone! touch screen sucks!it looks more hi-tech for a non smartphone buts its not its very simple and all of the stuff on ur sd card u wont b able to use! i hang up on most ppl but the rest the phone puts on hold? idk y? when i first got it it was nice then u live with it and its bad my husband bought a sharp phone as well and its bad too!

Reviews.Title: bad phone and customer service
Reviews.Author: rjm
Reviews.Content: When we recvd the phone some of the numbers had to be pushed several times in order for it to work.  The phone would turn on and off without pushing any buttons.  Was not able to send pics. The worse part is that we have to pay the shipping charges to have the defective phone returned.  Would not order another phone from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: N. Lodes
Reviews.Content: Possibly the worst phone you could get. Touch screen is unresponsive and you can not hear a thing from this phone. There is probably reason why there is only one Sharp phone on the market....

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it.
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: I always love phone with qwerty keyboards but suddenly today the phones keyboard stopped reacting and it will make a call even if I'm not touching it, it goes to my messages or my contacts or brings up the applications bar for no reason, the shipping was a week late. And now I have to buy a new phone when I have only had this one for 2-3 months. In ever should have bought it. Worst phone I have ever owned. And it will turn off for no reason and I can't just turn it on manually I have to undo the battery and there is only two ways to get the battery out which is prying it out with a pen or pencil or slamming it causing the battery to fall out... Waste of money, extremely disappointed. It's been turning off since the week I got it. All I do on it is texting and calling and I have AT&T; I see no reason why it would act this way.

Reviews.Title: worst design
Reviews.Author: rao
Reviews.Content: The screen lock system is very bad. The lock opens when the screen is tapped twice,there are more chances of making calls on its own when kept in pocket. It turn off and on when the slide is opened.

Reviews.Title: Awful, just awful
Reviews.Author: UsualllyUnskeptical
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone with some skepticism as I read some of the reviews. LISTEN TO THE REVIEWS. At first I loved it but after a few weeks a short while I hated it. The lock feature just wastes time and does not keep anybody out. It often freezes and the mp3 player sucks. I would never recommend this phone to a friend nor will I buy another Sharp phone.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: lacey
Reviews.Content: great touch sensor, keyboard is a little problamactic when it comes to auto correct but other than that its a great phone

Reviews.Title: Craptastic
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Mom of 2"
Reviews.Content: During the honeymoon phase, I loved this phone. 3 months later, no so much. I've babied this phone- it sits up high on my desk, undisturbed by anyone shorter than 5 feet tall, never been dropped or so much as scratched the wrong way.The touch screen sucks. I honestly cannot say one good thing about the screen.I got it because my husband and I text a lot while he's on the road. I don't even talk on it much. I liked it originally because the charging cord disconnects from the wallplug and doubles as a data transfer cable. It did take me a month to get a few songs on it, after buying a 50 dollar micro sd card, because it stores things whereever the heck it wants to then doesn't recognize them. Wasn't able to get ANY apps to work on it.But now, the S.O.B. won't even hold a charge. Left it plugged in all night about a week ago and discovered the phones microUSB hub is loose and you have to wiggle it certain ways to get it to charge at all. Finally got it to charge fully, according to the battery display, and boom, 10 hours later it was dead again, even though I hadn't used it ALL day. I kept hearing the electronic "I'm going dead" beep but wasn't sure exactly where it was coming from as there are a lot of various toys around, never figured it would be my phone since I had just disconnected it from the charger.The OS sucks too. It's not compatible with ANYTHING.Don't waste your free phone on this one, it's a piece of crap.

Reviews.Title: Do not even think about buying this phone
Reviews.Author: An avid mystery reader
Reviews.Content: This phone was purchased from Amazon as a gift for me.  I have had it for one month and one day.  The touch screen is frozen and I cannot use it at all. I cannot even unlock it to answer.While it did work it dropped calls, automatically switched over on call waiting and generally was not a good phone.It is going back to Amazon.  I thought Sharp products had improved but evidently they have not.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: kathryn castelazo
Reviews.Content: I bought to use while doing a tour in Afghanistan, this phone is worse than the ones that you can get out here at cheaper price.DO NOT BUY!

Reviews.Title: It does'nt accept multimedia text even picture messages. All the apps are blocked. No internet services
Reviews.Author: Paul Onuegbe
Reviews.Content: Initially I recommeended it to my friends but when I found out that it does not accept picture, no access to internet services, It turns a night mare to me because I was not well informed by the customer assistant I talked to. This phone by itself is awesome because the latest inquiry led to the discovery that with your phone service provider APN set up the phone can give you all you need in a modern phone

Reviews.Title: Best phone I have had!!!
Reviews.Author: Momof4kids
Reviews.Content: This phone is super reliable. its texting is great and the touch screen is right one. I have dropped this phone from pocket height onto any and every surface and the body and screen maintain themselves amazingly. This phone has been through a lot and works great. The battery holds up well. After over a year of this phone, very little glitching and no noticeable slow down. Great phone!!!

Reviews.Title: Sharp fx cell phone.
Reviews.Author: Ben C
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for almost 2 years, and I have had to replace it 3 times. Because the buttons wouldn't work or it would freeze up on me. Finally I bought a new phone after my call button and end button stopped working. I treat my cell phones well, it doesn't have a scratch on it and it still doesn't work. Overall I would not recommend this phone to ANYONE!

Reviews.Title: To quote Luke Skywakler  "What a hunk of junk!"
Reviews.Author: Brendan M Kiel
Reviews.Content: Let me begin by saying that I am 26 years old and I am a networking engineer.  I am not a child, or a little old lady, but someone who is very familiar with electronics and computers in general.Previously I had an iphone, but due to expensive data fees i decided to drop down to a 'freebie' phone.  It seemed to have decent reviews, so i went with it.This phone is utterly useless.Let me make a list of all the drawbacks of this device, starting with the most prominent (i promise you will not have to read past #1 before you are convinced to not buy this.)1.  This device turns itself off, even when it is fully charged.  The only way to turn it back on, is to pop out the battery, then put it back in.  If you don't do that, you can hit all of the buttons you like, and it won't do ANYTHING.2.  Touch screen is pitiful and akin to what you would expect on a touch screen device from the late 90s.  It is incredibly laggy and inaccurate.3.  Apps are useless and unless you get a data plan with this, you cannot get new ones without paying both for the app and a bandwidth fee for the download.4.  Documentation on anything as simple as adding ringtones is scant and can only be found after about an hour of googling.there are many many many more complaints I could list regarding this device, but those are the big ones.This phone was so terrible that I had to resort to resuming use of my nine-year-old Nokia N-Gage in its stead.  For the record, that N-Gage is much more stable and reliable than the FX.Long story short, if you do not mind your family members thinking you died in a horrible accident, by all means get this phone.  otherwise I completely advise against it.

Reviews.Title: i love this phone
Reviews.Author: C. Elmore "Eric Jerome Books"
Reviews.Content: I recently upgrade to this phone at first i thought i wouldnt like it but now i do it hasnt gave me any trouble i hope this phone last longer than my old pantech phone

Reviews.Title: Read reviews.
Reviews.Author: Gizelle_Chanelle
Reviews.Content: Keyboard is great for textingVolume is greatCustomize ringtone HAS to be LESS than 500kbScreen & screen touch is OKLook is professional lookingInternet using is OK, BUT not greatWhen you purchase this phone keep in mind that this phone is an old year model & also the company Sharp doesn't really make phones (at least from MY knowledge) so don't expect to muchI personally believe that you can find a BETTER NON-SMARTPHONE which is called the Samsung Impression

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation
The Sharp FX STX-2 is a replacement for the Quickfire and adds live mobile TV, 2 megapixel camera, video sharing capability, and a standard 3.5mm audio jack
The FX also features a sliding QWERTY keyboard, a touch screen display, 3G data, GPS navigation, and microSD slot
This device also comes equipped with an email client, MMS and SMS text messaging, Bluetooth compatibility, and quad-band GSM along with WCDMA modes for international use
This offer includes a battery, battery cover, and wall charger
